website_summaries.verdict: This heavy, pub-style dartboard is sturdy enough to withstand a lot of punishment from children or teens. It's best suited for beginners or recreational players.
pros: Measures regulation 18 inches and is made from self-healing sisal
Construction is very sturdy and heavy, and the printed scoring numbers are very visible
cons: Metal dividers are thicker and more prominent, leading to many more bounce-outs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with easy-to-see numbers.
customer_reviews.text: The 18" bristle dartboard turned out to be a high-quality board (which I expected from Franklin). I like this style where the numbers are easier to see as opposed to boards that form the numbers out of wire. This also came with the necessary mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing, less than Walmart quality
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a mangled box. Once opend it looked to be pre used, which is a problem since it was advertised as new. The bottom of the board is all smashed and the piece used to hang it is missing. Very dissapointing. Was not expecting anything too special for 30$ but would at least hope for Walmart quality, this thing looks like something you would get at a garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Retriever mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality on the board surface finish
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the finish on the surface is bad.. it has areas on the face of the board that have very uneven coating .. doesn't look very good... question if it will hold up..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good quality dart board
customer_reviews.text: This dart board appears to be good quality, not some cheap knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Love. Finally got it hung up and have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Love. Finally got it hung up and have been practicing every day. It's heavier than I imaged but it isn't going anywhere on the wall. I love how smooth sounding the darts are going into the board. I was looking for a board to practice on that wasn't expensive but wasn't cheap and flimsy. This was the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: M Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's taken some pretty heavy use and is holding up extremely well
customer_reviews.text: This is a high density dart bard that you would find in a bar or competition. It is very heavy, so I bolted it to the carpet-covered, "losers" board and mounted the whole assembly to the wall. Nothing moves. It's taken some pretty heavy use and is holding up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick dartboard. Ive used it so much i filled the holes with spackling and use paint makers to recolor it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Coulter

customer_reviews.title: good dart board
customer_reviews.text: nice board! I gave it as a gift to my Dad and he loves it. He had no trouble hanging it up. We appreciated the variety of hanging hardware it comes with. you can mount it in the center or at the top. So far the self healing is working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J & D Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the board but the package and Board smell like mildew and there is slight damage to bottom of the board, sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Scarey

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Haven’t used it, it was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great dart board for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. Very well made. Thick and heavy material. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not totally self-healing
customer_reviews.text: High quality and heavy, but the board is not as self-healing as the listing leads you to believe. It is very dense cork, but not totally self-healing. Pro darts do leave nicks and small chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Wiring came off after only 3 weeks of play. Very disappointed. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: gail gowitt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, play on it almost every weekend. Holes close fast & it’s fun!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, nice, think dart board. However, the hardware does not come attached & part of it was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The only thing good about this dartboard was the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing good about this dartboard was the price. Have only had the product for a month and the wires have broke every time they were hit by a dart. The double bulls eye has a big hole in the center. Would not recommend this dartboard. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Siegmund

customer_reviews.title: Just received
customer_reviews.text: This darts board is not what you see on darts TV. made of WOOD, Not sisal fibers!! I don't recommend this for your long term darts practice. But it's ok I'll play with this. Kind of decent price for killing this pandemic period. :)
customer_reviews.author: Quehan Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a ten year old! So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Lots of fun between us and our grandkids! So glad we purchased this dart board.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L Dame

customer_reviews.title: Trash.com
customer_reviews.text: This dart board is Trash.com...First off i guess you got to have a arm like Nolan Ryan to get a dart to stick and stay in board.Even if you do get a dart to stick wait a couple of seconds and it will fall out SMH.
customer_reviews.author: katrina robinson

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our backyard. Hung on the tree and it has lasted in the rain and the wind. We just use it for cookouts and when friends come over. I will recommend this
customer_reviews.author: M. Venables

customer_reviews.title: Excellent board for the casual player, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for a couple weeks and the board seems to be holding up great!! Couldn’t ask for more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Salsman

customer_reviews.title: Great Dart board
customer_reviews.text: Great Dart board!! I use a black widow hammer head, but i feel like i can use the piranha darts and would pierce just fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Sturdy as can be. Have had alot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Scaggs

customer_reviews.title: looked like it sat outside for awhile
customer_reviews.text: really heavy duty board,but it was filthy,looked like it sat outside for awhile,not cool if its being gifted..
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice feeling board
customer_reviews.text: I'd rather be able to give this 3.5 stars. It's a nice feeling board, but the staples could be a little less obtrusive in some places. Also, the biggest concern is that while it does come with mounting hardware, NONE of the centers or relevant points are marked on the back of the board. So you'll have to do a good bit of very exact measuring to get your board hung correctly. Not too much of a problem if you're equipped for it, but it's worth mentioning because every other board I've had, had the center screw and the brackets already started into the board, or at least the points for them marked.
customer_reviews.author: JzeroSH

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter dartboard
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a month now and I've used it everyday. For the price, I wasn't expecting it to be as heavy and sturdy as it is. My only complaint is that it has a high amount of bounce offs. It seems that this is being caused by some of the thick metal pieces that hold the board together. If you're looking for a cheap and simple dartboard definitely go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K

customer_reviews.title: Great for a rec
customer_reviews.text: This board is heavy so don't plan to hang it from one simple hook on sheet rock. Great for a rec. room. It's very good quality and should last for a long time with only the grand sons playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our family is very happy with this pub style dartboard. Very heavy duty, attractive, would definitely recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my nephew who was totally thrilled with it and played right away!
customer_reviews.author: SavedByGrace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for man cave
customer_reviews.text: Held up great! Been a couple of months and still using it to this day
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: board started falling apart after only 1 week. staples holding wire fall out and wire framework breaks apart
customer_reviews.author: gordon birnie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty dartboard. I gave this as a present to my grandson , he loved it. I wanted something that would last, this looks, and feels like it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tifton Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Nice dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Well made dartboard. A bit difficult to mount but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: RAG

customer_reviews.title: Great board for a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.text: Dartboard works like a dream. Should last you quite a while. Its also got a very strong wire guide. Wont break on the off chance someone hits it.
customer_reviews.author: Zakariah

customer_reviews.title: Love This Dartboard
customer_reviews.text: The numbers seem a little smaller than what's in the sellers picture, but for me it's still a great board. I'm completely a recreational player, and this board is great, except for the metal wiring, which I removed. Now my darts stay in the board without deflecting out. The hardware is a little basic, but if you measure out an "x" on the back of the board, it hangs good on the back of a door.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the board for weeks, it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and used?
customer_reviews.text: The dart board came in looking like it had hung in a pub for the last 9-11 years. Dusty and dirty. Not true to the colors. The box was broken. Seemed sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Board.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this board weekly since we received it. It is very durable. The game is fun to play at parties and just to test yourself and practice. We have enjoyed this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hoosier

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Professional Wire Dartboard - Regulation Size Dartboard - 18" Inch Bristle Dartboard
product_meta.description: The Franklin Sports Pro Wire Dartboard is the perfect way to bring an authentic darts experience into your home. The self-healing sisal playing surface provides premium playability and durability, while the steel wire dividers give an authentic gameplay experience. Additionally, the printed number ring around the board makes the numbers easy to see and count from a distance while resisting wear and tear. This dartboard set comes complete with a wall bracket so you can secure it to the wall easily at your desired height. Bring the fun of darts into your home today with Franklin Sports Pro Wire Dartboard!
feature_bullets: Self Healing: this set is made from top notch Sisal for enhanced play
Steel wire: solid steel dividers are designed to last
High contrast: printed number ring makes it easy for players to read the board
Official size: great for game room play to competition play
Family owned: At Franklin Sports we are a family owned company and proud of it! Step up your game and join the Franklin fam today
